title: Where's my chest

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: A few weeks ago I earned an S rank on katarina, but didnt get a chest. I had also just unlocked her that day or the day before, so I hadnt gotten a chest with her before either. She remains the only champion in my collection that has earned an S- or above while not receiving a chest. Riot what happened?

replies.body: Heya, it looks like you're out of chest drops!  Keep an eye for the chest icons on the profile section of the client, as one should refresh each week.  Once you get one renewed, you'll be able to grab another mastery chest for the week.  More info in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide too!
Thats what I figured because it said 6 days till next chest available, but then when it said 2 days til next chest i got an S on blitzcrank and received a chest.
